name: Itsik Pe'er
content: Research Brief | Itsik Pe'er Skip to Main Content Area Itsik Pe'er HOME Publications Research People Software Contact Openings About Me Full Professor, Vice-Chair Department of Computer Science Fu Foundation School of Engineering & Applied Science Professor of Systems Biology, Vagelos College of Physicians and Surgeons Columbia University Research Brief I study, develop and apply novel computational methods in human genetics. How is it best to measure, describe and quantify differences between individual DNA sequences? How does sequence variation affect biological processes? How can we use it to understand and influence human disease? All these questions pose complex analytical challenges, with direct impact on medical research Courses CBMF W 4761(Spring 2013) COMS W1005(Fall 2010) Who's new mg2880 itsik2 Vladimir Vacic Anat Kreimer Arthi Ramachandran Tel/virtual Email itsik@cs.columbia.edu Web www.cs.columbia.edu/~itsik Office:+1-212-939-7135 Mobile:+1-617-372-0536 IM/VoIP: Skype:itsikpeer GoogleTalk:itsikp Dept.
